metadata.title: How to Create YouTube Shorts 2025: Complete Guide
metadata.description: Learn to create YouTube Shorts that get views. Filming, editing, and optimization tips for vertical video.

hero.headline: How to Create YouTube Shorts
hero.subheadline: Master vertical video. Create Shorts that hook viewers and grow your channel.

sections.content: YouTube Shorts are vertical videos under 60 seconds. They're YouTube's fastest-growing format and can rapidly build subscribers. Creating effective Shorts requires different techniques than long-formâ€”here's everything you need to know.

content.title: Hook Fast
content.description: First 1-2 seconds critical. Start with action or intrigue.

content.title: Loop Potential
content.description: End where you began. Seamless loops boost watch time.

content.title: Text On Screen
content.description: Many watch without sound. Captions and text essential.

faq.question: Do I need #Shorts in the title?
faq.answer: Not required anymore but helps initially. YouTube now auto-detects vertical videos under 60 seconds. Including it doesn't hurt.

faq.question: Can Shorts be monetized?
faq.answer: Yes. Shorts Fund pays creators. Also drives subscribers to your monetized long-form. Shorts increasingly part of RPM calculations.

faq.question: Best length for Shorts?
faq.answer: 15-45 seconds often performs best. Long enough to deliver value, short enough to rewatch. Under 60 seconds required.

faq.question: Should I repurpose TikToks?
faq.answer: Yes, but remove TikTok watermark. YouTube may suppress watermarked content. Re-export from original or use editing app.
